眨眼的；闪光的；可恶的；十足的；一眨眼的

bilingual.target: 她从出生起就是失明的。

bilingual.source: The blind man navigated the busy street with ease.
bilingual.target: 那个失明的男人轻松地穿过了繁忙的街道。

bilingual.source: They developed a new technology to assist the blind.
bilingual.target: 他们开发了一项新技术来帮助失明的人。

bilingual.source: The organization helps blind people learn new skills.
bilingual.target: 这个组织帮助失明的人学习新技能。

bilingual.source: He is blind and uses a guide dog to get around.
bilingual.target: 他是失明的，需要导盲犬来引路。

bilingual.source: So the truth is, there are no bats which are naturally blind.
bilingual.target: 所以事实是，没有蝙蝠是天生失明的。

bilingual.source: Trachoma is a kind of illness that may make people become blind.
bilingual.target: 沙眼是一种可能使人失明的疾病。

bilingual.source: For him, it was one thing to accept his own fate of being blind.
bilingual.target: 对他来说，接受自己失明的命运是一回事。

bilingual.source: He has spent nearly two years planting flowers for his blind wife.
bilingual.target: 他花了将近两年的时间为他失明的妻子种花。

bilingual.source: Can you imagine how it feels to be blind?
bilingual.target: 你能想象失明的感觉吗？

list.abstract: blind，英 [blaɪnd]，美 [blaɪnd]。英语单词，形容词、副词、名词、动词，作形容词时意为“盲目的；瞎的”，做副词时意为“盲目地；看不见地”，作名词时意为“掩饰，借口；百叶窗；（Blind）人名”，作动词时意为“使失明；使失去理智”。短语搭配“go blind”。相关例句有：He became blind when he was 14 years old.翻译：他14岁时失明了。 复数： blinds，第三人称单数： blinds，现在分词： blinding，过去式： blinded，过去分词： blinded。
《Blind》是韩国组合B.A.P演唱的歌曲，收录在B.A.P第四张MINI专辑《MATRIX》中，于2015年11月16日发行，由队长方容国作词，是B.A.P少有的悲伤情歌，又被称为“兔式情歌”。

yingyinNormal.en: You're blind. Not as blind as you, boy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看不见。至少比你看得清楚，小子。

yingyinNormal.en: Forgive me. I was too blind to see.
yingyinNormal.zh: 原谅我我贪欲迷心没能发现。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies》

yingyinNormal.en: Bob Birch? Blind leading the stupid.
yingyinNormal.zh: 鲍勃·博奇？瞎子给蠢货带路。

yingyinNormal.en: And my veil was lace, made by blind, Belgium nuns. Blind?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我戴着蕾丝婚纱，它是由比利时瞎修女织的。瞎眼？

yingyinNormal.en: The second is the blind spot barrier. Everyone has blind spots.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第二个是盲点障碍。每个人都有盲点。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't like dwarfs, they're greedy and blind, blind to the lives of those they deem less than their own.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不喜欢矮人，他们贪婪又盲目，瞧不起他们眼中的劣等生物。

yingyinNormal.en: If you blind a soldier for a single second in the middle of a fight, he dies. If you blind a country for 24 hours, the loss of life is unthinkable.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果士兵在战场上失明，哪怕一秒钟他死定了，如果整个国家的通讯系统瘫痪24小时，很难想象多少人会丧命。

yingyinNormal.en: Charles thinks I'm blind where you're concerned. We should go in.
yingyinNormal.zh: 查尔斯认为我对你太感情用事。我们进去吧。

yingyinNormal.en: But you're blind to it, because you believe they're all like Moira.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你视而不见，因为你相信他们都像莫莉娅。

yingyinNormal.en: The boy is guilty. His only guilt is his blind desire for your love.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他有罪。他唯一的罪过就是对您爱的盲目渴望。

yingyinNormal.en: Lordy! Can you even see in these? Yes. Yes, I can! I can. I'm blind!
yingyinNormal.zh: 老天爷！戴这东西还能看见吗？是，我能看见。我瞎了！

yingyinNormal.en: We can, blind man, because the Old Man is dead! Our demons lie south!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们承受的起，瞎子，因为长者已经死了！我们的对手在南方！

yingyinNormal.en: Mitzy's dead? She was old and blind, Leonard. What choice did we have?
yingyinNormal.zh: 米琪死了吗？她已经又老又瞎了，莱纳德，我们也无能为力。

yingyinNormal.en: Just so we're not flying completely blind, I went ahead and bluejacked his assistant.
yingyinNormal.zh: 咱们不能像没头苍蝇乱飞，我黑了他的助理。

yingyinNormal.en: No, no no no. You'll be fine. Hillary's blind, right? She will be after tonight. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不会，放心好了，希拉里是瞎子吧？过了今晚就是了。

yingyinNormal.en: Once the feeds populate, she'll have eyes in the building, but Samaritan will be blind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 信号一接入，她就能监视楼内，而撒马利亚人可不能。

yingyinNormal.en: What are you doing, what are you doing? It's my New Year's resolution. To blind my child?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在干什么？这是我的新年新希望。把我儿子弄瞎？

yingyinNormal.en: Places without surveillance, blind spots. It also comes in digital. This will be useful indeed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 标注了无监控处，盲点，还有电子版本。这个确实有用。

yingyinNormal.en: And when I wipe washed up his eyes. Eyes came out. Man, he just lit up. He says I thought I was blind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当我擦拭冲洗他的双眼，眼睛睁开了。伙计，他顿时亮了。他说，我以为我瞎了。

yingyinNormal.en: Question: how do you walk the runway blind? It's just that we stay at the same Four Seasons all the time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请问你们都瞎了，是怎么走T台的？是因为我们每次都是住在同样的四季酒店。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 愚钝的; 视而不见的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 愚钝的; 视而不见的

sense_info_list.en: unable to see because of injury, disease, or a congenital condition
having no knowledge of information that may cause bias during the course of an experiment or test
lacking a growing point or producing leaves instead of flowers
seeming to be unreasonable, and accepted without question

word_usage.usage:
表示“对……视而不见”时须接介词to。例：
She is blind to her husband's faults. 
她对丈夫的过错毫无察觉。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (as blind as a bat)有眼无珠的
蒙蔽; 使失去判断力
未注意的; 不在意的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 看不见似的；眼瞎似的；未看见地；未注意地；盲目地；不加考虑地

word_family.mean: adj. 失明的；瞎的；盲的；愚钝的；没有眼力的；隐藏的；封闭的；丝毫的；一丁点儿的；盲目的

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 视力极差的；几乎看不见的

sense_info_list.en: unable to see because of injury, disease, or a congenital condition

examination_example.sentence: So the truth is, there are no bats which are naturally <highlight>blind</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以事实是，没有蝙蝠是天生失明的。

sense_info_list.en: seeming to be unreasonable, and accepted without question

examination_example.sentence: To prevent teenagers from falling into <highlight>blind</highlight> idolatry, efforts should be made in more ways than one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了防止青少年盲目崇拜偶像，应该从多方面努力。

sense_info_list.zh: (as blind as a bat)有眼无珠的

examination_example.sentence: The saying "<highlight>blind</highlight> as a bat" simply isn't correct.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “像蝙蝠一样瞎”这句话是不正确的。

sense_info_list.en: confuse or overawe someone with something difficult to understand
sense_info_list.zh: 蒙蔽; 使失去判断力
未注意的; 不在意的

word_usage.usage:
the +形容词表示一类人，the blind泛指“盲人”时，后面谓语动词一般用复数。
示例：盲人需要我们的帮助。
误 The blind needs our help.
正 The blind need our help.

具体表达哪只哪个眼失明了，介词要用in，不能用of。
示例：他左眼瞎了。
误 He is blind of the left eye.
正 He is blind in the left eye.

turn a blind eye to表示“对...视而不见”“对...熟视无睹”。
示例：他对自己的错误视而不见。
误 He is blind of his own mistakes.
正 He is blind to his own mistakes.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 盲目地; 视线受阻地

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 失明；盲目；愚昧；无知；盲区
n. 给新建道路铺石砂填补路面缝隙；石砂；混凝土垫层

word_family.mean: adj. 失明的；瞎的；盲的；愚钝的；没有眼力的；隐藏的；封闭的；丝毫的；一丁点儿的；盲目的

examination_example.sentence: When Wilson heated it, the container exploded, leaving Wilson <highlight>blinded</highlight> in both eyes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当威尔逊给它加热时，容器爆炸了，导致威尔逊双眼失明。

examination_example.sentence: For him, it was one thing to accept his own fate of being <highlight>blind</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对他来说，接受自己失明的命运是一回事。

examination_example.sentence: He learned braille (盲文) quickly and continued his education at Worcester College for the <highlight>Blind</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他很快学会了盲文，并在伍斯特盲人学院继续接受教育。

sense_info_list.zh: 盲目地; 视线受阻地

examination_example.sentence: Her vision (视力) problems were so serious that she became <highlight>blind</highlight> in the end.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她的视力问题非常严重，最后她失明了。

examination_example.sentence: He became <highlight>blind</highlight> when he was 14 years old.

sense_info_list.en: seeming to be unreasonable, and accepted without question

examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一句谚语说“爱情是盲目的。”
